page.title: 10THE LIFE OF A VICAR
page.content:
The Reverend J. Maynard is the vicar of St. Thomas a Becket, the parish church of Pagham. (see page 2) He has been in the parish for fifteen years.
We found out that he is a very busy man. In the week before we saw him he had taken one funeral, two weddings, the blessing of a marriage, a baptism and a burial of ashes. Also quite some time had been spent in planning services and printing posters for a flower festival. He had also taken confirmation classes.
Once a month he goes to Kings Haven, which is an old people's home. He also visits the old people at Pagham Windmill. Mr. Maynard visits hospitals and takes communion to people who cannot get to church.
